name: KALMATRON® KF-JET
description: KALMATRON® KF-Jet designed as a premix to the dry Ordinary Portland Cement (OPC) powder for production of Rapid Set Cement (RSC) and Fast Setting Cement (FSC) with controlled setting time. Distinctive difference from known products is that concrete after application has twice lower drying shrinkage cracks and no construction gap, highest abrasion resistance, impermeable to the liquids, and adjustable hardening time.
